items.title: EcoFlow offers ‘Buy 3, Get 1 FREE’ promo on its RAPID power banks and GaN chargers, more from $20
items.summary:
Running parallel to its ongoing New Year power station sale event, EcoFlow has also launched a special “buy 3, get the cheapest item free” promotion for a selection of its RAPID power banks and GaN charger blocks, while also offering up to 50% discounts on other models not part of the promotion. You’ll find options like EcoFlow’s RAPID 25,000mAh 170W Power Bank down at $94.99 shipped, after using the sitewide 5% off coupon 26EFNYAFF at checkout, which is one of the models included in the “buy 3” promotion. Of course, if you aren’t interested in taking advantage of the promotion, you can find it $5 cheaper over at Amazon. It carries a $200 MSRP direct from the brand, but can more often be found starting from $150 elsewhere, with discounts having kept the cost down at $90 at Amazon since December. Depending on where you pick it up from, you’ll be getting either a $55 markdown directly from EcoFlow or a $60 markdown at Amazon, giving you the third-lowest and second-lowest prices we have tracked. Head below to scope out all the other deals during this event.

While it carries a $170 MSRP directly from the brand’s website, you’ll more often find it down lower at $130 to $150 at Best Buy and Amazon. Discounts over the last year largely repeated and dropped costs to $100 until Black Friday rolled around and we saw it fall as low as $80. You’re still looking at a solid $50 markdown from the going rate, giving you a reliable and more compact cutting solution at its fourth-lowest tracked price that only lasts until midnight.

items.title: Tenways’ 37-pound CGO600 Pro e-bikes drop to $1,599 with $118 FREE bundles + 50% off range extender, more
items.summary:
Tenways has switched up its New Year e-bike sale offers, with the event currently providing you with up to $600 discounts on models, as well as an extra $200 savings when buying two together. Aside from the more premium models seeing continuing deals from last week, there’s also others like Tenways’ CGO600 Pro Belt Drive Commuter e-bike at $1,599 shipped, while the CGO600 Pro 8-speed chain-drive e-bike is also down at $1,599 shipped. Both of these variants also come with $118 FREE bundle package alongside the option to score a Power Bank (range extender) for an additional $155 (normally $309). These e-bikes normally fetch $1,899 outside of sales, which we’ve mostly seen dropped to $1,599 in our post-tariff market, while select events, like Black Friday, saw the price dip $100 lower. You’re looking at the second-best price of the last year, with $300 cut from the price tag and $418 in savings ($572 in savings if you opt for the power bank offer). You can head below to browse the full lineup of deals.
